View Javadoc
1   package com.test.vendor.mysql;
2   
3   import com.test.AbstractTestSuite;
4   import org.hibernate.cfg.JdbcSettings;
5   import spring.SpringTargetApplication;
6   
7   public abstract class ConcreteMySqlSuiteIT extends AbstractTestSuite {
8   
9       public ConcreteMySqlSuiteIT() {
10          this.config();
11      }
12      
13      public void config() {
14  
15          this.jdbcURL = SpringTargetApplication.propsMysql.getProperty(JdbcSettings.JAKARTA_JDBC_URL);
16          this.jdbcUser = SpringTargetApplication.propsMysql.getProperty(JdbcSettings.JAKARTA_JDBC_USER);
17          this.jdbcPass = SpringTargetApplication.propsMysql.getProperty(JdbcSettings.JAKARTA_JDBC_PASSWORD);
18  
19          this.jsqlDatabaseName = "musicstore";
20          this.jsqlTableName = "Student";
21          this.jsqlColumnName = "Student_Id";
22          
23          this.jdbcColumnForDatabaseName = "TABLE_SCHEMA";
24          this.jdbcColumnForTableName = "TABLE_NAME";
25          this.jdbcColumnForColumnName = "COLUMN_NAME";
26          
27          this.jdbcQueryForDatabaseNames = "select TABLE_SCHEMA from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.tables where TABLE_SCHEMA='"+ this.jsqlDatabaseName +"'";
28          this.jdbcQueryForTableNames =    "select TABLE_NAME from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.tables where TABLE_SCHEMA='"+ this.jsqlDatabaseName +"'";
29          this.jdbcQueryForColumnNames =   "select COLUMN_NAME from information_schema.columns where TABLE_SCHEMA='"+ this.jsqlDatabaseName +"' and TABLE_NAME='"+ this.jsqlTableName +"'";
30          this.jdbcQueryForValues =    "select "+ this.jsqlColumnName +" from `"+ this.jsqlDatabaseName +"`.`"+ this.jsqlTableName +"`";
31      }
32  }
